name: Lynx
prepare_command:
if [ -f "./tools/lynx_tools/lcm" ]; then
  tools/lynx_tools/lcm sync .
fi
if [ -f "./package.json" ]; then
  tools/oliver/lynx-kernel/build.sh ios Darwin/iOS/JSAssets/release/lynx_core.js Darwin/iOS/JSAssets/debug/lynx_core_dev.js 
  tools/oliver/lynx-canvas/build.sh ios Darwin/iOS/JSAssets/release/lynx_canvas.js Darwin/iOS/JSAssets/debug/lynx_canvas_dev.js 
fi

pod_target_xcconfig.GCC_PREPROCESSOR_DEFINITIONS: RAPIDJSON_HAS_STDSTRING=1                                                                    RAPIDJSON_NAMESPACE=lynx::rapidjson                                                                    RAPIDJSON_NAMESPACE_BEGIN="namespace lynx{namespace rapidjson{"                                                                    RAPIDJSON_NAMESPACE_END="}};namespace rapidjson=::lynx::rapidjson;"                                                                    JS_ENGINE_TYPE=1                                                                    NDEBUG=1                                                                   __ENABLE_INSPECTOR__=1                                                                    LYNX_ENABLE_TRACING=0                                                                    LYNX_ENABLE_FROZEN_MODE=0                                                                    OS_POSIX=1                                                                   LYNX_ENABLE_TRACING_BACKEND_NATIVE=0

script_phases.name: config_h
script_phases.script:
[ ! -d ${TARGET_BUILD_DIR}/Lynx/gen/Lynx/config ] && {
            mkdir -p ${TARGET_BUILD_DIR}/Lynx/gen/Lynx/config
          };
          ${PODS_TARGET_SRCROOT}/build/util/write_cmake_config.py \
          -o ${TARGET_BUILD_DIR}/Lynx/gen/Lynx/config/config.h \
          ${PODS_TARGET_SRCROOT}/Lynx/config/config.h.in \
          HOST_OSTYPE=HOST_IOS \
          LYNX_DEBUG=0 \
          ENABLE_ARK_REPLAY=__ENABLE_ARK_REPLAY__ \
          ENABLE_HMR=__ENABLE_HMR__ \
          ENABLE_ARK_RECORDER=__ENABLE_ARK_RECORDER__ \
          ENABLE_INSPECTOR=__ENABLE_INSPECTOR__ \
          INSPECTOR_TEST=__INSPECTOR_TEST__ \
          ENABLE_LEPUSNG_WORKLET=__ENABLE_LEPUSNG_WORKLET__ \
          ENABLE_NAPI_BINDING=__ENABLE_NAPI_BINDING__ \
          ENABLE_KRYPTON_EFFECT=__ENABLE_KRYPTON_EFFECT__ \
          ENABLE_KRYPTON_AURUM=__ENABLE_KRYPTON_AURUM__ \
          ENABLE_KRYPTON_RECORDER=__ENABLE_KRYPTON_RECORDER__ \
          ENABLE_NEW_ANIMATOR_TRANSFORM=1 \
          ENABLE_KRYPTON_RTC=__ENABLE_KRYPTON_RTC__ \
